## Synopsis

## Data Processing

Data is awailable in internet by [link](`r dataurl`). we download it and store in working folder for further use and loading into R.
```{r "load data", cache=TRUE}
if ( !file.exists(locfile)) {
  download.file(dataurl, locfile, method = "curl")
}
dataset <- read.csv(locfile, header = T, nrows = 1e3)
```
